snippet: Washington put aside its partisan caps Wednesday as the Nationals played the Cardinals in Game 3 of a National League division series.
abstract: Washington insiders put aside their partisan caps as the Nationals host St Louis Cardinals in Game 3 of National League division series, city's first postseason baseball game since 1933.

byline.contributor: Brian Stelter contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Washington put aside its partisan caps Wednesday as the Nationals played the Cardinals in Game 3 of a National League division series.

headline.seo: For a Day or Two, Consensus Inside the Beltway
